RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: graduado em Engenharia Mecnica pela Universidade Federal do Paran (2003); Mestre em Aerodinmica, Propulso e Energia, pelo Instituto Tecnolgico de Aeronutica (2006), e Doutor em Engenharia de Mquinas de Fluxo pela Universidade de Gnova (2009). Atuou em pesquisa nas seguintes reas de conhecimento: turbinas a gs, reversores de trao, CFD, sistemas hbridos com clulas a combustvel e anlise termoeconmica. Desde 2010 Especialista em Regulao da Aviao Civil, na Agncia Nacional da Aviao Civil - ANAC, atuando na rea de processo normativo de aeronavegabilidade. Desde 2017 ocupa o cargo de Gerente Tcnico de Processo Normativo na Superintendncia de Aeronavegabilidade da ANAC.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: He has degree in Mechanical Engineering at Paran Federal University (2003), MSc in Aerodynamics, Propulsion, and Energy at Aeronautical Technological Institute (2006), and Ph.D. in Flow Machine Engineering at University of Studies of Genoa (2009). He has experience in research in the folowing areas: gas turbines, thrust reversers, CFD, SOFC hybrid systems, and thermoeconomic analysis. From 2010 he is a Civil Aviation Regulation Specialist in the National Civil Aviation Agency - ANAC, Brazil, working in rulemaking of airworthiness. Since 2017 he is the Rulemaking Technical Manager in the Airworthiness Department of ANAC.
